title: Honoring the Beauchamp Branch Library upon the occasion of its designation as recipient of the inaugural AWE Literacy Success Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  the Beauchamp Branch Library upon the
occasion of its designation as recipient of the inaugural  AWE  Literacy
Success Award

WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that the
quality and character of life in the communities across the great  State
of  New  York  is  reflective  of  certain  exemplary institutions whose
purpose is dedicated to serving the community and the needs of its citi-
zenry; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor the
Beauchamp Branch Library upon the occasion of its designation as recipi-
ent of the inaugural AWE Literacy Success Award; and
  WHEREAS, The  winner  of  the  inaugural  award  is  Beauchamp  Branch
Library,  part  of  the  Onondaga County Library System in Syracuse, New
York; their awe inspiring winning submission was "Cooking Up  Literacy",
a  creative,  well-rounded program that helps children ages five through
twelve improve their reading, writing, and math skills, along with heal-
thy eating habits; a panel of five judges selected the winner and  Beau-
champ  Branch  Library was presented the award at the 2011 ALA Midwinter
Meeting in San Diego, California, on January 8, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, Cooking Up Literacy runs as eight 2.5 hour sessions over four
months; prep stations each have ingredients, utensils, and gloves; and
  WHEREAS, As children arrive, they are given  fill-in-the-blank  recipe
cards as well as copies of the recipes for the day; they have used reci-
pes  from  guest  chefs,  and  seasonal recipes, as well as recipes from
cookbooks the children have checked out from the library; and
  WHEREAS, The children then copy the recipes, with assistance from  the
older  children  and  volunteers, and then go to the prep stations where
they read and follow the recipe; then the session culminates in  setting
the table and sharing the results; the library plans to run this partic-
ular program each year; and
  WHEREAS,  Steeped  in a proud and distinguished history, the Beauchamp
Branch Library may take just pride in its purposeful growth, as it looks
forward to continuing to serve the educational, cultural and intellectu-
al needs of the community; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  the Beauchamp Branch Library upon the occasion of its designation
as recipient of the inaugural AWE Literacy  Success  Award;  and  be  it
further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Beauchamp Branch Library.
